entry.title: Amas Updates on Mar 12, 2024
entry.content:
Ask these people anything!

  • Sindre Sorhus (⭐143) - Full-time open-sourcerer. Maker of many npm packages and apps.
  • Robert Haritonov (⭐1) - Front-end team lead, SourceJS maintainer and Living Style Guide evangelist.
  • Drew Minns (⭐0) - Designer/Developer and Educator. Lead Developer and Instructor with HackerYou.
  • Heather Payne (⭐1) - CEO of HackerYou, founder of Ladies Learning Code.
  • Ryan Christiani (⭐0) - Lead Instructor and Developer at HackerYou in Toronto.
  • Ahmad Nassri - Head of Engineering at Mashape. Technology Entrepreneur & Dog Lover. Toronto ✈ San Francisco.
  • Patty Delgado (⭐0) - Engineering lead at Refinery29. Avid mentor and developer evangelist, especially for women and minorities.
  • Derick Bailey (⭐2) - Developer and entrepreneur, author and screencaster.
  • Andy Jiang (⭐1) - Customer Acquisition and Evangelist at Segment, maker of things.
  • Rishabh Pugalia - Full stack engineer. Creator of CSSDeck.
  • DeokHong Kim (⭐2) - Front-end engineer at NAVER, founder of hackrslab.
  • Trent Oswald (⭐2) - Maker of web things Mashape and nodejs/website.
  • Acho Arnold - Full stack web developer with great passion in Social Psychology.
  • Honza Bittner (⭐1) - Student at FIT CTU, Dart lover.
  • Charlike Mike Reagent (⭐5) - Passionate full stack developer, hacking on ArchLinux. Perfectionist. Revolutionist. Founder of RegexHQ, core member at JSTransformers and part of dwylhq.
  • Graham Daniels (⭐5) - Sr Software Engineer at Refinery29, US Lead for PHPWomen, Host of #NoCapes, Single dad. Brooklyn, NY.
  • Jeff Carouth (⭐0) - Lead Platform Engineer at Liftopia, Co-host of the Loosely Coupled Podcast, mentor, and conference speaker.
  • Matthew Turland (⭐2) - Full Stack Engineer at When I Work, author, mentor, and conference speaker.
  • Hamish Friedlander (⭐0) - Developer, CTO at SilverStripe, human (presumed).
  • Deepak Verma (⭐1) - Full stack developer at Hometrack Australia, AWS Solution Architect, and passionate about photography.
  • Dan Abramov (⭐222) - JavaScript and React hobbyist, creator of React Hot Loader and Redux.
  • Chris Biscardi (⭐0) - UI lead at Docker. JavaScript. Haskell. Builder of products and tooling.
  • Vladimir Agafonkin (⭐6) - Engineer at Mapbox, creator of Leaflet and a bunch of other open source libraries. Building the future of interactive maps.
  • Zeno Rocha (⭐71) - Developer Advocate at Liferay.
  • Kahlil Lechelt (⭐0) - JavaScript developer, organizes KarlsruheJS, co-host of the Descriptive Podcast and the Reactive Podcast, vocalist.
  • Raymond Clanan (⭐0) - Freelance full stack developer at Utopian Concept LLC.
  • MK Yuan (⭐3) - Node.js developer at Alipay.
  • Hong Liu (⭐0) - Freelance full stack web developer and founder of PresentBook.
  • Anthony Ramella (⭐1) - I went from zero to hired web developer in 5 months. I blog about my experiences learning code and working as a junior developer.
  • CJ Patoilo (⭐2) - Front-end engineer, JavaScript evangelist, DEV IO co-Founder.
  • Armagan Amcalar (⭐1) - Head of Software Engineering at unu GmbH. Software architect, entrepreneur, conference speaker, mentor, electronics engineer, guitar lover, singer.
  • Breno Polanski (⭐1) - Front-end software engineer at Meteorite BI.
  • Ariya Hidayat (⭐30) - VP of Engineering Shape Security, Author of Esprima and PhantomJS.
  • Rob Thomas (⭐0) - VoIP Developer, IPv6 and Security Evangelist, DevOps proponent. Currently at Sangoma.
  • William Oliveira - Front-end developer (Brazilian) working with JavaScript, Angular, Stylus, Gulp, Git, etc. Read more about me on my blog.
  • Unbug Lee (⭐0) - Author of MIHTool and Codelf.
  • Tibor Simon (⭐0) - Electrical engineer, software geek, DSP, iOS, vimmer, guitarist, biker, runner, tiborsimon.io.
  • Danilo Vaz (⭐1) - Front-end developer (Brazilian), working at mLabs with JavaScript, EmberJS, APIs and other cool stuffs. I'm also BeerJS/SJC organizer.
  • Adrian Mejia (⭐1) - Software engineer at Cisco. Blogger at adrianmejia.com. Author of "E-commerce Application built with the MEAN stack". JavaScript lover. Boston located.
  • Jon Kuperman (⭐23) - I love JavaScript! I blog at Codeplanet, make videos at Nodecasts and podcast at The Web Behind.
  • Max Stoiber (⭐28) - Open source developer advocate at Thinkmill, developing KeystoneJS and ElementalUI. Creator of react-boilerplate, part of React Vienna.
  • Joe Lencioni (⭐1) - Building ImportJS and Diffux CI. Web infra at Airbnb.
  • Haroen Viaene (⭐0) - Student mostly doing JS, open source everything, creating stuff at bullgit.
  • Artem Sapegin (⭐15) - Frontend developer at Here, creator of React Styleguidist and passionate photographer.
  • Miguel Durán - Developer of things and stuff at Typeform, creator of React Slidy. Love videogames, embrace StandardJS. Living in Barcelona.
  • Lizzie Siegle (⭐0) - iOS and web developer, developer evangelist, hackathon hacker and judge, Spectra organizer, racially ambiguous.
  • Krzysztof Cieslak (⭐8) - Software developer, consultant, founder of Lambda Factory, author of Ionide, Forge, Fornax, project owner and maintainer of VSCode-Elm, contributor to many OSS projects, international speaker.
  • Kevin Jalbert (⭐0) - Developer Lead at Shopify), primarily using Rails and React.
  • Sean Killeen (⭐5) - .NET Lead & Managing Consultant at Excella. Speaker, blogger, tech lead. Would love to talk .NET, modernization, distributed systems, public speaking, musical theatre, and really pretty much anything else.
  • Juha Lindstedt (⭐0) - Web architect at iDiD. Creator of RE:DOM, Deck of Cards and other open source projects.
  • Md Eftakhairul Islam (⭐0) - Software engineer, hacker, open source enthusiast and tech blogger at eftakhairul.com.
  • Omar Bahareth (⭐5) - Head of Software Engineering at Tam, mentor, full-stack developer, currently heavily into Ruby and Elixir, and slowly getting into Go and Rust. Located in Saudi Arabia.
  • Brad Garropy - Self-taught frontender at Adobe, blogger, streamer, tweeter.
  • Eduards Sizovs (⭐0) - Software architect, blogger, trainer, speaker, and a conference organizer.
  • KimSia Sim (⭐0) - Independent developer, blogger, owner of business apps agency. Based in Singapore.
  • Jim Lesperance (⭐2) - Passionate full-stack developer, loves dogs, and likes to travel.
  • Chris Otto (⭐0) - Test Engineer, creator of VSCodeFitNesse and blogger.
  • Arpit Mohan - Distributed Systems Engineer, Java and Golang developer, 3x CTO, blogger.
  • Felipe Plets (⭐0) - Tech lead, open source contributor, and blogger.
  • Jan-Hendrik Heuing (⭐0) - Developer, team lead, CTO, consultant.

Ask these organizations anything!

  • Nikita Voloboev (⭐36) - Loves making and sharing things. Building Learn Anything, Enpicom and tools.
  • Code Monkey Health (⭐0) - Helping developers and others with tips, tricks, recipes and programs focused on Lifestyle, Exercise, Attitude and Food LEAF.

  • Pascal Hartig (⭐33) - Polyglot. Engineer at Twitter. Contributor to Yeoman, TodoMVC, WSK.
  • Mark Otto (⭐94) - Designer at GitHub. Creator of Bootstrap.
  • Zach Holman (⭐729) - Developer and speaker. Previously worked at GitHub.
  • Kent C. Dodds (⭐682) - JavaScript dev, open source contributor, community builder, and speaker.

entry.title: Amas Updates on Jul 04, 2015
entry.content:
Ask these people anything!

  • Stephen Sawchuk - Just having fun. Creator of wiredep, youmeyou. Helper of ^.
